member.name: M:Olive.Entities.DefaultApplicationEventManager.Log(System.String,System.String,Olive.Entities.IEntity,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs the specified event as a record in the ApplicationEvents database table.
member.param: The event title.
The details of the event.
The record for which this event is being logged (optional).
The ID of the user involved in this event (optional). If not specified, the current ASP.NET context user will be used.
The IP address of the user involved in this event (optional). If not specified, the IP address of the current Http context (if available) will be used.

member.summary: Entity, a persistent object in the application.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.#ctor
member.summary: Base constructor (called implicitly in all typed entity classes) to initialize an object.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.GetId
member.summary: Gets the id of this entity.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.InvalidateCachedReferences
member.summary: Invalidates its cached references.

member.name: P:Olive.Entities.Entity.IsNew
member.summary: Determines whether this is a newly created instace. This value will be True for new objects, and False for anything loaded from the database.

member.name: P:Olive.Entities.Entity.IsMarkedSoftDeleted
member.summary: Determines whether this instance is "soft-deleted".

member.name: F:Olive.Entities.Entity.IsStale
member.summary: Determines whether this object is already cloned and updated in the database without this instance being updated.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes this instance. This can be overridden in the business entity types to provide "construction" logic.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.GetPrimitiveProperties
member.summary: Gets the primitive properties of this tye.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.ExtractPrimitiveProperties(System.Type)
member.summary: Extracts the primitive properties of a specified type.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.ToString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string that contains all primitive properties of this instance. This should be used normally in "full text search".

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.ValidateProperties
member.summary: Validates the data for the properties of the current instance. It throws a ValidationException if an error is detected

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.Validate
member.summary: Validates this instance to ensure it can be saved in a data repository. If this finds an issue, it throws a ValidationException for that. This calls ValidateProperties(). Override this method to provide custom validation logic in a type.

member.name: P:Olive.Entities.Entity.Loaded
member.summary: This even is raised just after this instance is loaded from the database.

member.name: P:Olive.Entities.Entity.Saving
member.summary: This event is raised just before this instance is saved in the data repository.

member.name: P:Olive.Entities.Entity.Validating
member.summary: This is raised just before the object is being Validated. It will automatically be called in Database.Save() method before calling the Validate() method. Use this to do any last-minute object modifications, such as initializing complex values.

member.name: P:Olive.Entities.Entity.Saved
member.summary: This event is raised after this instance is saved in the database.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.OnSaved(Olive.Entities.SaveEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: P:Olive.Entities.Entity.Deleting
member.summary: This event is raised just before this instance is deleted from the database.

member.name: P:Olive.Entities.Entity.Deleted
member.summary: This event is raised just after this instance is deleted from the database.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Entity.Clone
member.summary: Creates a shallow copy of this object. If you need to update an instance loaded from the database, you must create a Clone of it before applying any changes. Otherwise you will be editing the "live" instance from the cache, that is used by all other threads!

member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to this instance.

member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to this instance.

member.summary: Implements the operator ==.

member.summary: Compares the current instance with another object of the same type.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.

member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of this object.

member.summary: Gets the original id of this type as it was in the database.

member.name: T:Olive.Entities.EntityManager
member.summary: Provides services for Entity objects.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.EntityManager.IsImmutable(Olive.Entities.IEntity)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified record is immutable, or closed for changes. An object marked as immutable is shared in the application cache. Therefore it must not be changed.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.EntityManager.MarkImmutable(Olive.Entities.IEntity)
member.summary: Marks the specified object as immutable.

member.name: F:Olive.Entities.EntityManager.InstanceSaving
member.summary: This event is raised for the whole Entity type before "any" object is saved in the database. You can handle this to provide global functionality/event handling scenarios.

member.name: F:Olive.Entities.EntityManager.InstanceSaved
member.summary: This event is raised for the whole Entity type after "any" object is saved in the database. You can handle this to provide global functionality/event handling scenarios.

member.name: F:Olive.Entities.EntityManager.InstanceDeleting
member.summary: This event is raised for the whole Entity type before "any" object is deleted from the database. You can handle this to provide global functionality/event handling scenarios.

member.name: F:Olive.Entities.EntityManager.InstanceValidating

member.name: T:Olive.Entities.GuidEntity
member.summary: Represents a base Entity with ID of type Guid.

member.name: P:Olive.Entities.GuidEntity.ID
member.summary: Gets a unique Identifier for this instance. In the database, this will be the primary key of this object.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.GuidEntity.Clone
member.summary: Creates a shallow copy of this object. If you need to update an instance loaded from the database, you must create a Clone of it before applying any changes. Otherwise you will be editing the "live" instance from the cache, that is used by all other threads!

member.name: T:Olive.Entities.IEntity
member.summary: Represents an M# Entity.

member.name: P:Olive.Entities.IEntity.IsNew
member.summary: Determines whether this object has just been instantiated as a new object, or represent an already persisted instance.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.IEntity.Validate
member.summary: Validates this instance and throws ValidationException if necessary.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.IEntity.GetId
member.summary: Gets the id of this entity.

member.summary: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.

member.summary: Invalidates all its cached referencers.

member.summary: A persistent object in the application.

member.summary: Gets the ID.

member.summary: Gets a unique Identifier for this instance. In the database, this will be the primary key of this object.

member.name: T:Olive.Entities.ISortable
member.summary: Represents a sortable entity type.

member.name: T:Olive.Entities.Sorter
member.summary: Provides Sorting services for all entities.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Sorter.MoveBefore(Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.SaveBehaviour)
member.summary: Moves this item before a specified other item. If null is specified, it will be moved to the end of its siblings.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Sorter.MoveAfter(Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.SaveBehaviour)
member.summary: Moves this item after a specified other item. If null is specified, it will be moved to the beginning of its siblings.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Sorter.MoveUp(Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.SaveBehaviour)
member.summary: Moves an item up among its siblings. Returns False if the item is already first in the list, otherwise true.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Sorter.MoveFirst(Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.SaveBehaviour)
member.summary: Moves an item up to first among its siblings. Returns False if the item is already first in the list, otherwise true.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Sorter.MoveLast(Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.SaveBehaviour)
member.summary: Moves an item up to last among its siblings. Always returns true.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Sorter.MoveDown(Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.SaveBehaviour)
member.summary: Moves an item down among its siblings. Returns False if the item is already last in the list, otherwise true.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Sorter.Swap(Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.SaveBehaviour)
member.summary: Swaps the order of two specified items.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Sorter.JustifyOrders(Olive.Entities.ISortable,Olive.Entities.SaveBehaviour)
member.summary: Justifies the order of a specified item and its siblings. The value of the "Order" property in those objects will be 10, 20, 30, ...

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Sorter.FindSiblings(Olive.Entities.ISortable)
member.summary: Discovers the siblings of the specified sortable object.

member.name: M:Olive.Entities.Sorter.GetNewOrder(Olive.Entities.ISortable)
member.summary: Gets the Next order for an ISortable entity. The result will be 10 plus the largest order of its siblings.
